question: What is the role of tankyrases in response to Double Strand Breaks (DSBs)?
ideal_answer: Tankyrases promote homologous recombination and check point activation in response to DSBs.

snippets.text: Tankyrases Promote Homologous Recombination and Check Point Activation in Response to DSBs.
Tankyrases Promote Homologous Recombination and Check Point Activation in Response to DSBs.
